feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:56 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers or flurries overnight. Blowing snow late in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the evening then becoming south 60 gusting to 80 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
